ThingDef.label: electric stove
ThingDef.description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: professional cook stove
ThingDef.description: A professional-quality stove and attached countertop for preparing meals in bulk. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electric pressure cooker
ThingDef.description: A stove for canning foods, drying fruit, and making tofu. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: soylent machine
ThingDef.description: A machine to produce Soylent Green from humanlike corpses. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electric sawmill
ThingDef.description: An electric saw for cutting logs into planks and kindling. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electric smelting furnace
ThingDef.description: A furnace used for smelting more advanced metal ores, slag, and sand into metal alloys and silicon-based alloys. Can make metal cans and produce charcoal from logs. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electric machining table
ThingDef.description: An electric table that can process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Can also make drill heads, create reinforced concrete and disassemble mechanoids. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electronics table
ThingDef.description: A table with tools for crafting electronic chips, robot parts, and the mobile mineral sonar. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: hyper tailoring bench
ThingDef.description: A sophisticated workbench equipped for tailoring and smithing advanced combat clothing, power armor, enhanced gloves and battle helmets. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: inorganic matter converter
ThingDef.description: A converter to turn resources into inorganic matter. Inorganic matter can be used to make other resources. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electric assembling bench
ThingDef.description: An electric table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms, and advanced mechanisms. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electric smithy
ThingDef.description: A smithing table equipped for basic weapon and protective apparel production. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: electric arc furnace
ThingDef.description: An electric arc furnace for advanced metal alloy smelting. Efficient, but requires a lot of power.

ThingDef.label: electric concrete mixer
ThingDef.description: An electric concrete mixer. Concrete is mixed from rubble and sand. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: deep drill
ThingDef.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources. This drill will yield stone chunks if no resources are present. Can be repositioned freely.

ThingDef.label: mine extractor
ThingDef.description: The mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract metal ores and rocks. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources, drill will yield stone chunks if no resources are present. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: advanced mine extractor
ThingDef.description: The advanced mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract metal ores. Works faster than regular extractor. However Deep Drill manned by experienced Miner can still be faster.

ThingDef.label: bio refinery
ThingDef.description: Refines biological matter like wood or plant matter into chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: crematorium
ThingDef.description: Cremates corpses, apparel or various resources into ashes. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: medical table
ThingDef.description: A table that is used to craft medicine and life support devices. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: Petrochemical Laboratory
ThingDef.description: A Petrochemical Laboratory where you can make byproducts of crude oil. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: organ vat
ThingDef.description: A large vat used to turn human corpses into biomatter and grow natural replacement organs. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: bio-refinery
ThingDef.description: A machine for making biodiesel and silage.

ThingDef.label: futuristic weapon workbench
ThingDef.description: A workbench that produces futuristic Mechanoid weapons, such as laser beam rifles. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: synthetic organ assembler
ThingDef.description: A workstation fully equipped with an extremely powerful nano-printer capable of producing synthetic organs and AI chips. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: bionics workbench
ThingDef.description: A workbench equipped for production of high-tech bionic prosthetics. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: cybernetics workbench
ThingDef.description: A workbench equipped for production of cybernetic implants. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: robotic assembler
ThingDef.description: A machine that applies state of the art robotics to construct machine components too intricate for simple human hands. Requires 5000W power when active.

ThingDef.label: quantum fabricator
ThingDef.description: The quantum fabricator is the forefront of quantum thermodynamics and plasma spectrometry. This machine disassembles elements into base subatomic particles and re-assembles them into powerful artificial elements. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: hadron collider
ThingDef.description: An apparatus for accelerating subatomic particles to high velocities by means of electric or electromagnetic fields. The accelerated particles are generally made to collide with other particles, either as a research technique or for the generation of high-energy X-rays and gamma rays.

ThingDef.label: hadron collider hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds inorganic matter for the hadron collider.
